title: Suspect Charged With Arson in Fire at South Africa’s Parliament
content:
1. Suspect Charged With Arson in Fire at South Africa’s Parliament  The New York Times
  2. New fire at South Africa's parliament 'contained'  BBC News

  4. Suspect arrested and charged as fire reignites at South Africa's Parliament  CNN
